Articles.Content: Back in the old days of KSP I could turn my planes when launching so they miss the lights at the end of the runway. Now I spinnout and waste fuel. i feel wheels should be able to drift but landing gear should be more "stiff" on the ground.
You can disable steering to disallow the wheels to swivel side to side. Best to disable steering in the VAB so that you know the wheels are locked straight and not canted slightly.
